Preparing for training activities
For training to proceed smoothly, certain preparations are
important.  This includes:
•issuing formal office orders to relieve the trainees
from their clinic or office work;
•informing participants early enough so that they canprepare for the training;
•ensuring that all materials needed are available andready for use;
•ensuring that resource persons are available on thedates
